definition: paternal aunt/husband's sister/husband's mother (old)/nun/for the time being (literary)

sentences.english: Technology of instant arrowhead(Sagittaria sagittrifolia)powder was studied in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了速溶慈姑粉的生產工藝。

sentences.english: Competition on growth between Juncellus serotinus and Sagittaria pygmaea was evident.
sentences.chinese: 水莎草與矮慈姑兩種雜草間也存在生態競爭關係。

sentences.english: This research demonstrated that one of the major factors affecting the growth of Sagittaria platyphylla is temperature.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，環境溫度爲影響闊葉慈姑發育的主導因素。

sentences.english: A preliminary report on the chromosome numbers of Sagittaria in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國慈姑屬植物的染色體研究初報。

definition: Manchurian wild rice 菰[gu1], aka water bamboo, or its edible stem, which resembles a bamboo shoot
Chinese water chestnut/Eleocharis dulcis or E. congesta
water spinach/ong choy/swamp cabbage/water convolvulus/water morning-glory/Ipomoea aquatica (botany)
Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 芡實|芡实[qian4 shi2]
